original_text: When God made his promise to Abraham, since there was no one greater for him to swear by, he swore by himself,
korean_text: 하나님이 아브라함에게 약속하실 때에 가리켜 맹세할 자가 자기보다 더 큰 이가 없으므로 자기를 가리켜 맹세하여

sentences.original_text: When God made his promise to Abraham
since there was no one greater for him to swear by
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 맹세할 더 위대한 분이 없었으므로
